Class AuthCredentials.ServiceAccountAuthCredentials

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.cloud.AuthCredentials

    Restorable<AuthCredentials>, ServiceAccountSigner

    AuthCredentials

    public static class AuthCredentials.ServiceAccountAuthCredentials
extends AuthCredentials
implements ServiceAccountSigner
    Represents service account credentials.
    See Also:
    User accounts and service accounts
